name: The Doctor (Istalri)
description:
You are a doctor in a hospital and you have to heal a maximum of patients without being infected.

This game was made during a 72H game at school. The theme was "Virus". Thanks to all peoples who participate in the creation of this project:

Léhna André (Art)
Arnaud Dalcq (Tech)
Jean-Bernard Geron (Tech)
Arnaud Sougnez (Art)
Maurice Tilman (Anim)
